1.title: Alcool
1.plot: Ruy Castro, writer, used to drink daily for 20 years, decided to stop when he began to vomit blood. He went through a rehabilitation at a hospital and never had relapsed.Today his compulsion is at work. He has written and published 19 books since he stopped drinking 27 years ago.

2.title: Anorexia
2.plot: Fernanda trying to overcome her anorexia became bulimic and even compulsory for food. Marina played sports compulsively developed anorexia getting to have 37 kg. Both have to overcome their compulsions.

3.title: Jogos Eletrônicos
3.plot: Renato is used to playing computer games compulsively since 10 years and because of that there were many quarrels with the family. Ylan played and ate sweets without stopping, were sleepless nights and even weigh 100 kg. Both realized the need to confront their compulsions.

4.title: Cocaína e Alcool
4.plot: Ana Karina used cocaine for 20 years, survived 11 overdoses and underwent 16 hospitalizations. John, from seus15 years, drank and smoked compulsively. The process of overcoming and controlling the dependence of both is the program theme.

5.title: Crack
5.plot: Esmeralda was a street child and became addicted to crack in childhood. Hadassa comes from a middle class family and began using cocaine and crack to 12 to 22 years. Both were arrested in Cracolândia and treatment and determination managed to overcome addiction.

6.title: Jogos de Azar
6.plot: Beth was a compulsive bingo player for 20 years. Moses played for 12 years and after losing a lot of money sought for help. Both talk about the treatments and decided to overcome addiction to gambling.

7.title: Cocaína
7.plot: Rodrigo, former bassist of the rock band Barão Vermelho, consumed cocaine for more than 20 years, and for 10 he's been clean. Fabio started using drugs at age 14 and stopped just when he discovered it was going to be a father. Both have their trajectories overcoming the addiction.

8.title: Anorexia E Compulsão Por Comida
8.plot: Moara suffered from chronic anorexia from age 11 to 18, came to weigh 32kg with 1.65m tall. Paul ate compulsively and when he reached 140kg, decided to have a bariatric surgery. The opposite trajectories of the two help us understand the overcoming of the types of compulsion on the act of eating.

9.title: Compras E Álcool
9.plot: Mary was compulsory for shopping and to buy was a way to feel loved and meet their needs. Stella started drinking very young and 30 years ago stopped with the help of therapy groups. Both talk about their paths to exit the bottom and bring their lives back to the surface.

10.title: Sexo e Afeto
10.plot: After a rape in childhood, Telma became compulsive sex and maintained relations of emotional dependence for over 30 years. Mauro, to overcome 25 years of alcoholism, saw his compulsion to migrate for sex and affection. Both talk about how to control their compulsive instincts.

imdb.plot outline: Compulsion is a TV series that shows different cases of addicts to food, sex, alcohol, cocaine, crack, sports, video games and shopping. In each program, compulsive people tell their story from the first contact with the dependency, the phases of pleasure and pain, culminating in stages of recovery.
imdb.title: Compulsão
plot: Compulsion is a TV series that shows different cases of addicts to food, sex, alcohol, cocaine, crack, sports, video games and shopping. In each program, compulsive people tell their story from the first contact with the dependency, the phases of pleasure and pain, culminating in stages of recovery.
